title: Eco-Friendly Closet & Built-In Materials
intro: Design packages prioritizing recycled content, FSC woods, low-VOC finishes, and verified supply chains.
highlights: Material transparency reports for every component
Options for rapidly renewable veneers and bamboo

faqs.q: Will sustainable materials increase lead time?
faqs.a: Lead times can extend by 2-3 weeks depending on supplier stock, but we plan schedules upfront and provide alternates if timing is critical.
